column4: Can someone answer me this: If I want to try multiple Disto's (I want Kubuntu, Ubuntu, and Xubuntu) is it better to install Ubuntu and the install KDE and XFCE or install them all seperately?
you can twy them all together, just will ccause some theme problems, and a bunch of redundant underlying bits (screen saver, network manager applet) and is a bit cumbersome
